message: Let's start with a fair but generous split.  I'm willing to give you 10% of the money. We have plenty of time to negotiate further.
I'm willing to split the money 60/40 in your favor, but we need to move quickly. The money is losing value for me with each passing round.
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but we need to make a deal soon. Time is not on our side.
This is my final offer. I'm willing to split the money 55/45 in your favor, but the clock is ticking. If we don't agree, we risk getting nothing.
